title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.156 - Goodwill
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.156 - Goodwill

State Regulations

The excess of the price paid for a business as a whole
over the book value or over the computed or agreed value of all tangible net
assets purchased. Normally, goodwill thus acquired is the only type appearing
on books of account and in financial statements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.156

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
